proceed with the culture of long-life learning and EPAM learning solutions that are targeted to support it.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Long life learning is considered today as the only possible and effective solution that allows professionals to keep up with the pace and even be ahead of the game. Those who are eager to stay up to date with a modern, fast-changing world need to do their utmost to improve their ability to identify learning opportunities.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is also worth mentioning that learning is certainly not the same that training. EPAM learning ecosystem is represented by 4 Es: Experience, Environment, Education and While Learn is a real digital platform where EPAMers can find all the available learning solutions, review their description, prerequisites and even register for any that may help to achieve professional goals.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For example, there is a dedicated learning path for RMs that is placed at our KB page.
